alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 11:07AM CST until January 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Freezing Drizzle Expected across Southeastern Iowa Later Today... Areas of freezing drizzle are expected to develop across southeast Iowa this afternoon, lasting into the evening hours. This will allow for slick conditions at times. Please use extra caution out on the roads today. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Much of southeastern Iowa. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening, mainly later this afternoon into the evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog may also reduce visibilities on top of the slippery conditions expected with the freezing drizzle. Please take it slow and use extra caution out on the roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.
